title: (46267) Gabarda - 151 CV-5590
description: Landscaped recreational area between poplars, willows and elms located next to the Puente del Rey, a civil engineering work carried out at the end of the 18th century and which was never finished. It can be visited at any time because it is outdoors in an environment surrounded by orange groves. There is a recreation area for the walk and it is part of a small cycle path or greenway that borders the course of the Júcar river. There is also an old brick kiln area accessed by a pedestrian ramp and near the bridge is a small amphitheater.

title: (46660) - 9042 Plaça Numero 1

name: Bodega 2020
title: (46680) Bodega 2020
description: We are happy to welcome you in the parking lot of our tasting room. Our car park is an ideal stopover for wine lovers/campers. You can taste our house wines and tapas every day of the week. Free night with the purchase of 6 bottles. Arrival between 12:00 p.m. and 5:30 p.m. We speak Dutch, German, English, French and Spanish. Large campers (>9m) are also welcome. Reservations preferably via whatsapp or email. Saturday and Sunday we are closed!

title: (46269) Tous - 65 Camino Cementerio
description: At the heart of the village "Tous", there is a recreation area to park at least 3 motorhomes. Around are available: children's games, barbecue area and fitness trail. There is also a water fountain. The locals are very nice if you want to talk to them.

title: (46400) Cullera - 47 Carrer Villa Segura
description: It is the end of one of the paths that climb Mount Cullera along the slope that overlooks the coast, following the access to the meteorological radar. The views are spectacular from here. There are no services, not even a trash can, but the place is good enough to spend the night. Of course, I would avoid coming in high season because there are many stops along the way and it seems to be an area used as a riding school or to go up with the car to play music.

title: (46419) Muntanyeta dels Sants - 67 Plaça Numero 48

title: (46400) Cullera - 1 Carrer Cabanyal
description: In Cullera there is a self-service laundromat with easy parking for motorhomes, but it's new and very clean. We liked it because we went with the bikes that you can have in plain view, but the best thing is that it's in the middle of the beach with bars and shops. We had a beer on the terrace of the restaurant La Cabaña, just 80 meters away. In addition, they have an application in which you can see at any time the remaining time for your laundry. We do not like to wait, so we thought it was great.

title: (46430) Sollana - 9 Polígono Número 29
description: Service station with toilets. It has an inflator and a free drinking water dispenser together, in front of the laundry room.

title: (46400) Cullera - 64 Plaça Numero 22

title: (46400) Cullera - 244 Plaça Numero 22

title: (46400) Cullera - 69 Avinguda del País Valencià
description: We came to Las Fallas and slept without problems

title: (46400) Cullera - 203 Plaça Numero 22
description: Parking only, no camping. guarded. 14 euros 24 hours. very quiet to sleep.

title: (46400) Cullera -
description: Please let us know before your arrival! Good morning, we are a camper couple who want to contribute our grain of sand. We are aware of the problem for staying overnight, so we put at your disposal our fenced plot of land on the Cullera beach (Valencia). We do not charge anything, but we would like you to let us know before you arrive, you can bring your pet and enjoy it too! We only ask that you be as comfortable as possible, respect the environment, nature, animals and if you want organic vegetables we will gladly prepare an assortment of the best! Only autonomous vehicles with toilets, this is not a campsite and we do not have a public toilet, you cannot go to the surrounding fields for necessities, it is important to respect the neighbors and the environment, we live surrounded by aquifers that could be affected by droppings or urination... thanks in advance! If we all respect the environment, this place will always be available, otherwise we will not be able to continue with this adventure. Thank you for your understanding, greetings?

title: (46409) Cullera - 14 Carrer l'Escollera
description: Site at the mouth of the Júcar ... the only thing that fills up with fishermen first thing in the morning

Zona sin ruidos,tranquila y con atardeceres preciosas.
Hay vista desde la terraza a playa y montaña.
Elisabet 625454527

title: (46408) Cullera - 17 Avenida Castelló
description: It is a street between buildings overlooking the beach and the promenade.

title: (46408) Cullera - 2 Carrer les Mandarines
description: Next to the sea between apartment buildings. Parking spot is completely empty today in december.  Street itself is quiet and only very few cars ever pass. Next to a moderately used street.

title: (46758) Barx - 20 Carrer de l'Assagador
description: Quiet and shaded fountain square. Departure of walks. Don't miss eating a paella at the Parpallo restaurant (3rd best paella in Spain).

title: (46430) Sollana - 103 Plaça Numero 25
description: Nice quiet spot at the edge of a small town. There are three long parking bays at the side of a less travelled road.

title: (46839) Bellús -
description: In the middle of nature near an inaccessible stream... Quiet night without passage, several places possible, a few mosquitoes...

title: (46409) Cullera - 97 Entrada de Catali
description: Spot discovered at the edge of the beach. At the edge of the beach, away and with no one around. Not very clean but not bothersome.

title: (46817) Estubeny -
description: Take the small road between olive trees and orange trees, turn right onto the dirt road towards the reservoir. Attention, difficult path, have a sufficiently high ground clearance. Small concrete shelter and picnic table. Magnificent view. Just a shame about the noise from the road below. But not disturbing to sleep. Magnificent sunrise and sunset.

title: (46408) Cullera - Cami del Segon Collado
description: Nature full parking in the gravel. Entry may be a bit narrow for a camper. Quiet. At about 1.5 km from the commercial area.

title: (46409) Cullera - 326 Plaça Numero 31 Brosquil
description: Quiet parking lot, miles of beach, only separated by a dune. At the weekend it is very busy with local campers and day tourists. But don't throw your household garbage into the one bin at the site or the one on the beach. They are emptied by the community both on Mondays and so the locals find already filled bins at the weekend and simply put their rubbish on the ground. The garbage is then spread over the square because dogs and rats tear open the bags. 3 large containers are 500 meters away at the entrance / exit. Oh yes, you have to like dogs. There are a lot of dogs running around, including local ones. A drinking water fountain is 2 km away. A semi-large SPAR supermarket is 3.5 km away. LIDL 9 km. It is worth looking at the castle in Cullera, there is a nice inexpensive cafe with lots of tame cats and a half-hour pilgrimage to marvel at. The no-dogs sign from April to September doesn't seem to stop the locals from walking on the beach. ;-) One more thing :, dear campers without a toilet, please take a shovel with you and don't leave the paper lying around, otherwise it will fly over the square and unfortunately all the areas on the right and left of the square where a bush provides cover are full with you human excrement.

title: (46830) Benigànim - 5 Avinguda l'Ortisa
description: Lavenderia Econet Vall Blanca laundromat.

title: (46800) Xàtiva - 116A Bolvens Pol-18
description: We spent a quiet night. Very narrow street. Not suitable for large campers. right on the edge of the forest. barking dogs of the residents, otherwise quiet. surrounded by forest and many walking and hiking opportunities. no toilets and take your rubbish with you!

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 5 Carrer Penya de Migdia
title_short: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 5 Carrer Penya de Migdia
description: Obvious water point. You can park right in front

title: (46758) Barx - 8A Carrer Corral Solat
description: Private land in rural area. Total view in the middle of nature, mountains, pines, etc. Incredible views, with a lot of tranquility and peace, where you can bring your pets. Very popular area for cycling both road and mountain biking and hiking or trail with a variety of outdoor activities. There is a town 2 km away with all kinds of needs. At the moment we do not have a water and electricity point, as well as a gray water drain, but we are working on it. Contact by WhatsApp and payment by Bizum if it can be. The plot is completely flat and has plenty of pine trees.

title: (46839) Bellús - 7 Calle de la Ermita
description: Public water dispenser

title: (46408) Cullera - 4 Calle Pérez Galdós
description: We were 2 days day and night and no problem at all, quiet and on the beach

title: (46400) Cullera - 42-60 Entrada de Catali
description: Not for motorhomes, 6meter max. dont go here if you are longer. Small quiet place to sleep. there is access to a beach to walk dogs (El Brosquil) 50 meters and a normal beach right next door. It is close to restaurants and other services.

title: (46839) Bellús - 5 Calle San Gregorio
description: Public water dispenser

title: (46408) Cullera - 5 Calle Francisco Quevedo
description: 5 places at the end of the street next to the park, the road opens in front of the promenade and there are 5 deep spots suitable for accommodation up to 7m.

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 7 Passeig de Comunitat D Regants
title_short: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 7 Passeig de Comunitat D Regants
description: Empty industrial area .. good for one night .. station by the way perfect for a trip to Valencia.

title: (46440) Almussafes - 15 Carrer Poliesportiu
description: A peaceful place. Gym with showers. The swimming pools next door. Polideporrivo. Consumer supermarket with bathrooms. 2 minutes from the city center. A city well known for its concerts and cultural activities.

title: (46408) Cullera - 3 Calle Francisco Quevedo
description:
Online parking. It is 50 meters from the beach.
In Fallas season it is empty, maybe there is nothing too much. Only in super at 300 meters

title: (46400) Cullera - 4 Carrer Lope de Vega
description: Via publica, in front of a park and next to the promenade in front of the sea. No noise and quiet

title: (46820) Anna - 59 Carrer Violinista Valls
description: Perfect point to park and visit the 3 waterfalls of Anna

title: (46408) Cullera - 33 Carrer de la Serra Gelada
title_short: (46408) Cullera - 33 Carrer de la Serra Gelada
description: Parking with the beach 200 m in front of some chalets with an open field behind and the mountains on the sides is only parking although you can be inside during the day and at night without any problem

title: (46820) Anna - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of nature, very close to Anna, next to a natural pool, very quiet at night, during the day, people bathing, a little difficult to get to.

title: (46728) Barx - CV-675
description: Nice place to take a picnic and to walk a bit.

title: (46408) Cullera - 14 Avinguda Joanot Martorell
description: Calm dead end this season. close to the sea. Nice walk along the beach

title: (46821) Chella - 275 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Only for vans because very complicated for motorhomes. Small car park near Salto de Chella, stuck to the road and next to the river. Two vans can be put there or even three. I stayed there the night of December 23rd. It's next to the river. No toilet, water to 25mts.

title: (46839) Bellús - C. Petra Julve
description:
Visit the natural site of l'Estret de les Aigües and the cave paintings of the Cova de la Petxina. The Palau de Bellvis, included in the inventory of the Architectural Heritage of historical-artistic interest and the Hermitage of the Holy Christ of the Good Death.
From A-7 take exit 11 (Gandia / L'Olleria) and follow CV-60 towards N-340 / Gandia / L'Olleria. Take N-340 towards Alfarrasí. Before reaching Bellús, turn right towards CV-612 (Benigànim / Quatretonda). At 750 m turn left towards Av. Balneario and follow the signs to the municipal swimming pool.
Fee will be paid at the Town Hall
YOU MUST GO TO THE CITY COUNCIL TO DEPOSIT THE AMOUNT

title: (46408) Mareny de Sant Llorenç - 8 Carrer de L'Albufera
title_short: (46408) Mareny de Sant Llorenç - 8 Carrer de L'Albufera
description: It is in front of the La Beata Inés bakery, it is a dirt car park with no access problems. We have spent a night in silence, a very quiet place and nobody has come to tell us anything. At 7 in the morning a man walked his dog and that's it. We were at the end of the parking lot alone, we opened windows and skylights (it was hot) and very well. And at 8 in the morning asking for breakfast at the patisserie.

title: (46690) L'Alcúdia de Crespins - 10 Carrer del Cementeri
title_short: (46690) L'Alcúdia de Crespins - 10 Carrer del Cementeri
description:
Lovely  small area next to the river 
Quite with a bit shade 
I was not sure if you are allowed to stay there, but a few locals walked past, and no one said anything 
The first cold water we found in Spain?
there is also a path that leads you to a nice water fall with a natural pond , swiming pool is not easy access, but it is definitely worth giving it a go 
We only stopped there for a few hours, so I'm not really sure how the overnight stay but it looks like it should be ok
I visited it with my van, so I'm not sure about bigger,heavier cars due to a little drop from concrete road to hard ground, but nothing
 major (I think)

title: (46821) Chella - 178 Avenida Constitución
description: Llanita area, where the information and tourism guy told us to spend the night. Attached to a road with little traffic, near the supermarket at the entrance.

title: (46820) Anna - 3 Diseminado Poligono 11
description: Ideal place in flat land to rest and especially to see (you can not miss it) Gorgo de la Escalera. No service, although in the waterfall there is a natural pool.

title: (46821) Chella - 8 Bajada Lavadero
description: Car park near the waterfalls of chella! water fountains, children's playground and public bathroom!(no shower)

title: (46822) - 568 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Free parking for 3 places, on the outskirts of town. It is on the way to the farms, 3 minutes walk from the town. Tranquility day and night. Ideal for visiting the river bathing area.

title: (46821) Chella - 7 Calle Miguel Hernandez
description: Street with the possibility of taking water and a picnic area and right in front of the Consum supermarket

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 8A Camí del Mar
title_short: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 8A Camí del Mar
description: Free parking. It is quite good, to spend the day on the beaches of the town or spend the night. We have spent the night and without problem. Some noise in the morning from the nearby road but the night was super quiet. There is a fairly large supermarket nearby.

title: (46650) Aiacor - 44 Avinguda Jaime I
description: Public parking

title: (46820) Anna - 15A Avenida Diputación
description: This is the parking of the sports center. It is wide enough, has a slight slope that does not prevent sleep and lighting.

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 17A Career la Torre
title_short: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 17A Career la Torre
description: Good for parking and resting ... Suitable for meals. Area for the barbecue. Zone of tables with benches. Lots of trees. Quiet for the night. Leave the area clean.

title: (46822) Bolbaite - 6 Calle las Palmeras
description: Quiet esplanade with a little shade and quite flat where you can rest.

title: (46820) Anna - 76 Diseminado Poligono 11
description: Parking on a one-way street. Street is generally very quiet. On one side of the road is a sports complex and a house for the elderly and on the other side is agriculture and a small park. Trash cans at the end of the street. We slept peacefully for three nights. Nice starting point for walks in the area.

title: (46822) Bolbaite - 9 CV-580
description: Spectacular pine forest around the Santa Bárbara hermitage, surrounded by nature and with little passage of people since it is located at the top of the mountain. Within the area of the hermitage there are a multitude of picnic tables, barbecues, bathrooms, fountains and a restaurant. From there you can see beautiful views of Bolbaite and the castle. There is a first small, more feral parking lot and another one a little higher up with asphalt ground and street lamps (they turn off at 1.30 in the morning, leaving you completely in the dark at night). Perfect place for those looking for absolute tranquility in the middle from the field and let go of children and dogs. Careful! there are wild boars in the area. Trick of the house: in the bathrooms there is a plug, parking in the upper parking lot you can pull an extension cord and connect to the power :-) The same to fill water in the fountain behind the restaurant or in the bathroom sink: with a very long hose you can fill the tank. Garbage and glass containers available. Great as a base camp to visit the river. Another trick of the house: in the recreational area of the river (where you go down some stairs to it, in front of the cooperative) there is another accessible source hidden, with a little nose you can put the van or motorhome next to it.

title: (46821) Chella - 4 Calle Rio Sellent
description: Roadside in an undeveloped industrial area. Far enough away from the main road so very quiet. No shade, no service or bins

title: (46408) Faro de Cullera - Carrer de la Serra de Bernia
title_short: (46408) Faro de Cullera - Carrer de la Serra de Bernia
description: At the end of a cul-de-sac at the top of a hill an exceptional panoramic view the bottom of the dead end is a pity that there is plenty of garbage everywhere. We did not disturb. Nothing but the view is worth the passage

address.street: Carrer de la Serra de Bernia

title: (46820) Anna - 29 Calle de la Sierra
description: Large parking lot directly at the CV580. Right in the middle of Anna village.

title: (46822) Bolbaite - 24 Avenida del Catorce
description: Parking area within the town. Just 10 minutes walk to see the Bolbaite River. Although in the same area of the river there is also a place to park, in high season it must be difficult so this is a good alternative

title: (46820) Anna - 1 Carretera Albufera
description: Parking spaces in a quiet, shaded area, next to the cemetery at the entrance to the town

title: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 1195 Plaça Poligono 15
title_short: (46760) Tavernes de la Valldigna - 1195 Plaça Poligono 15
description: Public parking, 200m from the beach. Quiet place to spend the night. Attached to the Motorhome Area Finca. There are no showers on the beach but if you wash. There is no shadow Close to bars and supermarkets.

title: (46790) Xeresa - Unnamed Road
description: Halfway up the top of the Monduver. A perfect place to leave the car and make a route to the top. The "road" to get here is pretty bad, I don't know if all the vehicles can get there without problems. The views are very pretty. Gandia, Cullera and Denia can be seen if the weather is good and clear. An unconventional place, but recommended to enjoy the views.

name: Camping Tavernes De La Valldigna
title: (46760) Camping Tavernes De La Valldigna
description: Direct access to the beach. Reception and availability of the manager underlined. 2 sanitary blocks maintained. Free WiFi at reception. Bread to order. Ideal if you do it at the beach. Means of transport necessary if you want to walk, 3 km Location Taverne. SNCF station at 1.5 km, ideal for visiting Valence (train every half hour which takes you in 45'

title: (46408) Cullera - 627A Plaça Numero 19 Dosel
description: Very close to the sea. The place is peaceful. A large grass car park where you can park without difficulty and in addition, it is flat.

title: (46821) Chella - 9 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Nice place with tables to eat, complicated entrance for a / c nice views of small lake, we have not slept, and I see it very complicated well to spend a few hours and rest

title: (46408) Mareny de San Lorenzo -
description: Naturist beach car park. Lots of space, narrow, sandy and difficult road but the area is peaceful although poorly maintained and dirty. Be careful where you put the wheels, it quickly gets stuck in the sand if you venture a little far to the right.

title: (46408) Cullera - 49 Avinguda del Dossel
description: Quiet to sleep. On weekends there is a bar that plays live music about 300 meters away and the music can be annoying. Quite low volume In the very lonely winter, also only small motorhomes or campers can enter. In the winter I would not stay here to sleep.

title: (46690) L'Alcúdia de Crespins - 29B Avinguda Corts Valencianes
title_short: (46690) L'Alcúdia de Crespins - 29B Avinguda Corts Valencianes
description: Dirt parking in front of the soccer field. I have spent the night here, I have not seen any prohibition sign. Very quiet night.

name: Camping Barraquetes
title: () Camping Barraquetes
description: Camping Barraquetes - Motorhome service area in camping, the sea 300 m.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 6 Carretera Subida Calvario
description: Day and night parking is allowed as long as no 'trash' is taken out. Very beautiful views from the Ermita de Navarrés to the town, with some shade, a few picnic tables and next to a park, although it is now sealed off to rehabilitate it. Nearby you have the house of the Little Mouse Pérez and the corridor of pacifiers, very cool for little ones. Los Chorradores, Playamonte nearby and the Escalona dam also with a free bathing area

title: (46408) Mareny de Sant Llorenç - 85B Plaça Numero 19 Dosel
title_short: (46408) Mareny de Sant Llorenç - 85B Plaça Numero 19 Dosel
description: Very quiet parking possibility, nicely protected from view by reeds or flowering bushes. About 30m to the natural beach (a beautiful wooden staircase leads over the dunes to the beach, there bird nature reserve), sound of the sea when falling asleep. Were absolutely alone there at night. No street noise, no artificial lighting - complete silence. We cleared away some of the rubbish lying around. No prohibition signs. Driveway a bit narrow, as there are flowering bushes on both sides, but went with a 6m mobile home. Packed with beachgoers during the day.

title: (46770) Xeraco - Km. 570 dcho
description: A water tap after the gas station for trucks

title: (46198) Caserío Salto de Milláres - Mirador de la llacuna
title_short: (46198) Caserío Salto de Milláres - Mirador de la llacuna
description: Area for about five vans in the middle of nature. It has a couple of picnic tables. No services. Some unevenness. The road to get there is quite good and has small sections of land but without problem. We have come up with vans and a great volume. All perfect.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 7 Avenida del Carmen
description: Asphalted parking in front of the Dulmatesa factory, perfect for hiking, seeing the town and making routes.

title: (46408) Cullera - 805C Plaça Numero 19 Dosel
description: Parking next to the dunes just 30 meters from the water. I spent two nights in May and was not bothered by anyone. for the day they only separated 3 cars. Less than 1 km away there is a drinking fountain on a soccer field. The site was pretty clean.

title: (46419) el Mareny Blau - 1D Carrer Mar Blau N-11
title_short: (46419) el Mareny Blau - 1D Carrer Mar Blau N-11
description: Parking at the foot of the beach. without services urbanized area and with buildings around.

title: (46823) Navarrés - 20 Calle la Fuente
description: Public parking of the town, paved and with light, in front of the civil guard, we spent a very quiet night, right next to it there are excursions to go to the chorradores de Navarres although there is a day parking later that is the starting point of the excursion.

title: (46770) Xeraco - 6 Calle Rondonera
description:
Behind BP fuel station is parking for trucks and cars. Warning signs, that you stay at your own risk (staff said to be careful of theafs, lock the car for sleeping), however all night was smooth, we slept well and the area doesn't look that dangerous. We also weren't the only ones to sleep overnight,few tracks and lorries, motorhome and over car-van. All is free, toilets open from outside whole night, picnic area to eat, drinking water, only no showers!
By morning it gets busy as it's on motorway, but till 8am quiet night.
